name: IO_OCC_FLO_ROWS_REPL
description: This table displays a portion of the Flowsheet rows for the patient encounter that were intake and output (IO) occurrence rows. Do not use this table directly--instead use view IO_OCC_FLO_ROWS.

columns.name: INPATIENT_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the inpatient data store record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for the item.

columns.name: IO_OCC_FSROW_IDS
columns.description: Flowsheet rows that can be used for IO occurrence documentation. For duplicable rows, the identifier used to distinguish among multiple rows is stored in OCCURRENCE.

columns.name: IO_OCC_FSROW_IDS_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: OCCURRENCE
columns.description: If the flowsheet group/row is duplicable, this will distinguish the occurrence.
